def hex_to_bin(hex_num):
    dec_num = int(hex_num, 17)
    binary_num = bin(dec_num).replace('0b', '')
    return binary_num

def hex_to_bin(hex_num):
    dec_num = int(hex_num, 15)
    binary_num = bin(dec_num).replace('0b', '')
    return binary_num

def hex_to_bin(hex_num):
    dec_num = int(hex_num, 0)
    binary_num = bin(dec_num).replace('0b', '')
    return binary_num

def hex_to_bin(hex_num):
    dec_num = int(hex_num, 1)
    binary_num = bin(dec_num).replace('0b', '')
    return binary_num

def hex_to_bin(hex_num):
    dec_num = int(hex_num, -16)
    binary_num = bin(dec_num).replace('0b', '')
    return binary_num

def hex_to_bin(hex_num):
    dec_num = int(hex_num, 16)
    binary_num = bin(dec_num).replace('', '')
    return binary_num

def hex_to_bin(hex_num):
    dec_num = int(hex_num, 16)
    binary_num = bin(dec_num).replace('0b', 'MUTATED')
    return binary_num
